Uses of Interface
org.codehaus.preon.hex.DumpFragment

Packages that use DumpFragment
org.codehaus.preon.hex   
 

Uses of DumpFragment in org.codehaus.preon.hex
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon.hex that implement DumpFragment
 class BytesAsCharFragment
          A DumpFragment that translates every byte to a character representation - as long as it makes sense.
 class BytesAsHexFragment
          A DumpFragment that translates every byte to a two-character hex represenation, with support for grouping.
 class LinePosFragment
          A DumpFragment that will generate the line position, with the given number of characters, with trailing zeroes if required.
 class LiteralFragment
          A DumpFragment that will continuously generate the same literal, over and over again, for every line getting generated.
 

Constructors in org.codehaus.preon.hex with parameters of type DumpFragment
HexDumper(int bytesPerLine, DumpFragment... fragments)
          Constructs a new instance, accepting the number of bytes to printed on every line, and the fragments that should be included in every line.
